channel.title: Plotly on YufanZ
channel.description: Recent content in Plotly on YufanZ

item.title: Visualizing NFT Ethics: A Case Study on CryptoPunks
item.description: Authors: Yufan Zhang, Zichao Chen, Luyao Zhang, Xin Tong Accepted by ChinaVis 2022 arXiv | GitHub Paper Abtract As a blockchain-based application, Non-Fungible Token (NFT) has received worldwide attention over the past few years. Digital artwork is the main form of NFT that can be stored on different blockchains. Although the NFT market is rapidly developing, we observed potential ethical and racial fairness issues in the design of NFT artworks due to a lack of ethical guidelines or censorship.
